title: refactor: Update MultiAvatar.php, solving a SonarCloud bug

body: I've changed the return in line 29, of function  __invoke($avatarId, $sansEnv, $ver), which returned a variable that had been assigned to a value on the previous line, so that the returns gives the value directly
